channel.title: Homes on Shiqi Ye (叶仕奇)
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Shiqi Ye (叶仕奇)

item.description: Shiqi Ye is an Assistant Professor at the Center for Forecasting Science (CEFS), Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science (AMSS), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS). He is also a Special Research Assistant at the National Center for Mathematics and Interdisciplinary Sciences (NCMIS), supervised by Professor Shouyang Wang. Additionally, he has been serving as a research assistant at the National Natural Science Foundation’s Basic Science Center for Econometric Modeling and Economic Policy Study, supervised by Professor Yongmiao Hong.
